description.name: ltcbep20
description.tagline: LTC bep20 Crypto Payment Gateway (No KYC)
description.long: Crypto bep20-ltc Paymnet Gateway with instant payouts to your walllet without KYC
features: Accept LTC bep20 directly on your website
Unique bep20/ltc receiving address for every order
Instant payouts settlement to your bep20/ltc wallet
ZERO KYC for both the merchant and the customer.
